articles.author: Jazmin Goodwin, CNN Business
articles.title: American Airlines extends suspension of alcohol services following Southwest flight attendant assault - CNN
articles.description: American Airlines has joined Southwest Airlines in suspending alcohol services on flights, the airline said Saturday. The decision follows a recent assault of a Southwest flight attendant that resulted in a serious injury.
